item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hello, World! Link to heading Welcome, reader! This is my first blog post eva! :bowtie: If you are spending your precious time to read this first blog post, I believe you deserve to know the story behind this blog and why I want to have one (don’t worry, this is not a long post). First things first… Link to heading As any other programmer, I have my basket of standby projects, and one of them is this blog (maybe not in standby anymore, let’s see).
